item.title:
I am incredibly grateful to @Vetenskapsradet and @EMBO for supporting me with an international postdoc fellowship, and @StratNeuro for acting as my home institute in Sweden.
I will be using in vivo voltage imaging to study plasticity in the retrosplenial cortex, exciting stuff!

item.title: @KordingLab My take is that how we train students at all levels is a major factor in keeping science stuck in old ways. Students select psychology/biology (not always) because they don't like math/physics. And psych/bio is taught in totally archaic ways.
